items.content_html: A simple and responsive To-Do List application built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, using local storage to save tasks. This app allows users to add, delete, and mark tasks as completed. All tasks are stored locally, making it lightweight and perfect for small personal projects without the need for a backend server.
items.title: andrew-anshul/TodoList-LocalStorage: A simple and responsive To-Do List application built with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, using local storage to save tasks. This app allows users to add, delete, and mark tasks as completed. All tasks are stored locally, making it lightweight and perfect for small personal projects without the need for a backend server.

items.content_html: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.
items.title: TAGCH/Workflow-Automation: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.
